name: El Viaje de Diciembre
description: Set of 6 levels with a consistent rustic theme, inspired by EARTH.wad, Fistful of Doom, Evilution and other 90's goodies. The project originated as a speedmapping challenge for me where I'd make the first two maps in a day each, the next two in 2 days each, and so on. I wanted to have 6 full maps originally, but I only managed to finish 4, excluding the thank you map and the secret map.

name: Yandere AI Girlfriend Simulator: With You Til The End
description: Escape Room game with a Yandere AI girlfriend, who is integrated using ChatGPT.

name: Lovecraft's Mythos Run
description: LLC Blini Games have developed Lovecraft’s Mythos Run, an entertaining free to play 2D action endless runner with pixel art graphics based on their original roguelike multiplatform game, Lovecraft’s Untold Stories.

name: Evilmun Online
description: Evilmun Online - a separate part of your favorite online game mode for all platforms.

name: Quiz Thiz Germany: Gold Edition
description: Are you the new quiz master and can you beat your friends on this quiz? Answer questions about this country and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about this country while playing!

name: Scavenger
description: While searching for an exit in an old cave mine, the scrapper Kiro meets a small, broken robot who asks for his help to get to the exit of the mine. During this adventure, however, he discovers far more than he could ever imagine.

name: 1414: Crossroads
description: An RPG adventure, based on old-school, retro 2D games.

name: Enemies: Gone Suburban
description: Tired of the story? The plot? The looming twists? Take a break and shoot the shit and not in a conversational manner! Like literally, shoot shit!!! Well not actual shit but like, shoot things. Shoot....Enemies!

name: SpellSlingers
description: Cut down Thousands of enemies, from the undead to the mysterious creatures of the night to save the world from the impending doom, Spellslingers is a Fantasy Rogue-lite where you fight hordes of enemies with casual elements.

name: Containment Search
description: You are in an abandoned garage warehouse and have been locked up. will you survive the horror that awaits you there or will you stay trapped there forever?

name: 10 Lines Princess
description: Developed for the BASIC 10Liner 2023 contest, 10 Lines Princess is a sequel to the already impressive 10 Lines Hero, which was itself an entry to the 2021 edition of the contest. This time, killing enemies changes your color to allow for hazard immunity and more effective healing, among many improvements. The hero saved the princess, but after the hero had been captured, can the princess rescue her savior?

name: PETSCII Raiders
description: Based on the classic space invaders game. Destroy all raiders while avoiding guided projectiles from the mother ship at the top of the screen

name: Seeking Light: Chapter 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Catgirl Chainsaw Massacre
description:
A cute story about a girl and her sister living in a small village.
What mischief will they get up to next? Find out!!

name: Super Mario World Redone: Luigi Version
description:
Super Mario World Redone is a hack that aims to create much nicer visuals for the original Super Mario World, while adding some new features, secrets and an all new encore mode!
The game also includes new custom music and lots of bugfixes for the original game.

As a bonus, there are four new levels for you to find, and they are very well hidden! Can you find them?

And in this version you spend the entire game with Luigi!

name: Super Whatever Quest!!!
description:
Almost 3 years in the making, this is a spiritual successor to Super Nothing World, and Mario is on a picaresque journey to save the Mushroom Kingdom... or whatever.

I've incorporated some RPG elements into this hack. There's exploration, leveling up, and multiple endings. My idea was to make the dragon coin system from JUMP 1/2 into a central gimmick.

Level design styles include everything from standard: easy to kaizo: intermediate. Like most of my hacks, this pushes the boundaries between kaizo and standard. This is a hack that boldly proclaims, "Kaizo needs more fishin' boo." Let this be a warning.

My goal is to create a fresh experience that's accessible to kaizo players. If you decide to take up this challenge, I hope you enjoy!

name: My Eyes Deceive
description:
my eyes deceive is a first-person psychological horror experience set in a basement, or shelter, if you will. Set over the course of roughly a week, you play as a young girl who has been living there all her life.

The outside world is infected with a deadly disease. Society is in chaos. Fortunately, your papa is protecting you by keeping you in his shelter. He's very insistent on you taking your disease-preventive pills every day. Why do the pills make you tired? When will you be able to leave? Can we be deceived by our own perception?

name: MSX-Dino
description: A Google Chrome Dinosaur game brought to the MSX as part of the BASIC 10-Liner Contest 2023

name: DekaPari
description:
Your childhood sweetheart is dead. As you reminisce, you notice looming over her eternal site of rest, adorned with flowers, is a giant girl with a familiar face.

DekaPari is a spin-off of Towelket, a long running indie RPG Maker adventure series. Unlike previous entries, DekaPari's exploration is mostly in 2D as opposed to the isometric style. It is described by the developer as a "comfy pixel art RPG."

name: Fevirre's CT Pack
description: Fevirre's CT Pack is a custom track distribution for Mario Kart 8: Deluxe that adds in various retro tracks into the game.

name: La Linea
description:
A simple little game that requires mathematical skills, inspired by an Italian cartoon that
Rajcsányi László loved a lot when he was a child, but even now. The game is recommended for ages 8 and up, only for those who want a quick little game that can be played through in seconds with a little math.

name: Decimate Drive
description: Try escaping a killer car infested city. Decimate Drive combines atmospheric horror with engaging gameplay, while taking inspiration from 70s & 80s car-themed horror movies.

name: Quest for Sarah
description: The history of the cursed Belmont bloodline is in the pages hidden throughout the game. Talking to the townsfolk will give you valuable information in finding Sarah before it is too late.

name: Eloriasha
description: Inspired by the classics, Eloriasha is a simple yet challenging action-platformer about a man who's trying to save the world.

name: My Life as a Cult Leader
description: After you lose your job and apartment, you're left with nothing. Forced to spend the night on a cold park bench, you curse your fate, only for a beautiful woman calling herself Shima Itsuki to appear and ask you to be a cult leader...

name: Retro Short Game
description: Retro Short Game is a simple, 2D, multiplayer roguelike with content for both new and experienced players to enjoy: featuring three distinct weapons to learn and master, a variety of upgrades for the player to mix and match, and enemies with a myriad of attack patterns.

name: Tide Girl: Phenomena
description: Enjoy the murder by the word.

name: Within
description: Explore a broken world and gain the power to fix it, dealing with demonic adversaries along the way.

name: A Land Goo's Crazy
description: A hard platformer roguelite game whit manny RNG. Upgrades, skill improvements, Area- and Bossfights.

name: Alive Paint
description: To all the creative kids, teenagers, and their parents: meet a digital coloring book that animates itself! Paint its desaturated pages with vibrant colors to breathe life into its inhabitants, and they will show you a little performance in return!

name: Pricia Defense
description: One day, the North Fortress of the kingdom Enerf is invaded by northern sorcerers. The princess of the kingdom Enerf, "Pricia", with "trap magic" in her hands, which is only available to the royal family of Enerf, stands up.

name: Moonflower
description: When the source of the kingdoms magic is in danger, High Alchemist Nika Skylar has no choice but to intervene. Joined by a mysterious detective Skylar must act before the kingdom is plunged into darkness.

name: Fake Heart
description: Fake Heart is an "Interactive-Visual Novel" game about an episode between elderly fairy tale writer Jade and granddaughter Sarah.

name: Super Dream-Weaver
description: A Retro RPG as a roguelike. Build a party with fully customizable classes and the freedom to build the character of your dreams. A game where choices matter and directly influence your play.

name: Disc Golf: Game On
description: The fun of disc golf, coming to PC and console. Featuring six different throw types, ten unique courses and tons of new plastic!

name: Damn Ropes
description:
Damn Ropes is this one hard game nobody wants to play because it's too difficult a challenge but you play it anyway. Use your rope to swing from platform to platform. Perform impressive maneuvers, beat diverse challenges and speedrun your way through each level. Or just finish the levels at least.

There's no running and jumping in this platformer game. Use your rope to swing from platform to platform. Perform impressive maneuvers, beat diverse challenges and speedrun your way through each level. Oh, did I mention you can fall all the way down to the beginning of each level?

name: Maze: The Amazing Labyrinth
description: Maze (The Amazing Labyrinth) is interesting puzzle game for everyone. Get ready to face different types of challenges in the game.

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2021: Ford Remastered DLC
description:
Car Mechanic Simulator 2021 - Ford Remastered DLC includes 4 licensed cars:
- 1965 Ford GT40
- 1971 Ford Mustang Mach1
- 2017 Ford F350 Super Duty
- 2017 Ford Mustang GT

Engines:
- V8 Ford Small Block 302 (Windsor)
- V8 Ford Small Block 289 (Windsor)
- V8 Ford Cobra Jet 429
- V8 Ford COYOTE
- V8 Ford BOSS

DLC includes Engine tuning parts.

name: Finding Buddies
description: Daniel has just started his adult life. Despite his sad past, he managed to move on and re-socialize. So many responsibilities are coming and it is up to you to decide how he will handle all of this. The great thing is that maybe you can find some cute guys along your path

name: Night at Banban's
description: Play as a nightwatch looking over a kindegarten school known as BanBan's Kindergarten. Can you keep the mascots at bay and find out the truth?

name: Mega Man: The New Lands Remastered
description: Sin descripción

name: Resident Evil 4: Treasure Map - Expansion
description: Sin descripción

name: Old Gay Cats Look at Old Photos
description: A little Visual Novel about two Old Gay Cats [Named Romeo and Juliet] looking at Old Photos!

name: Xzap
description:
You are a lone Xzapper, last survivor of an advanced civilisation.Many centuries ago, your planet was besieged by alien hordes. Now only you remain. The aliens have the advantage of numbers, but you are on home territory. Your mission is to collect energy berries left on the tracks and complete all 12 levels.

The game was probably never released independently, only as part of a collection that came with the Commodore 16. The gameboy version does not follow the original game where you have to shoot. In this version you have to collect points, but the graphics solutions are very similar.

name: Doctor Who: An Unlikely Heist
description: Doctor Who: An Unlikely Heist is a puzzle adventure video game developed and published by Tilting Point through Apple Arcade for iOS, iPadOS, macOS, and tvOS.

name: Bit Orchard: Animal Valley - Platinum Edition
description: This bundle includes various Halloween-themed items and 5 mini games.

name: Bounce Journey
description: Experience the joy of bouncing through a whimsical world filled with excitement and wonder!

name: Legend of Arcadia
description:
Legend of Arcadia is a free-to-play and play-to-earn strategy-casual action card game built on the BNB chain that combines a traditional gaming experience with Web3 GameFi 2.0. In addition to experiencing the game’s immersive universe, players can also boost yield through staking, battling, and mining.

The fantastic game universe of LOA is centered on a fictional colony of small, toy-like, humanoid creatures resembling toys-henceforth referred to as toy heroes (in-game playable NFT characters). The aim of the game is to collect and raise different kinds of toy heroes (8 classes and 6 factions of toy heroes in total) and earn rewards through gameplay. Are you ready to embark on an epic journey through this fantasy universe?

name: MLB The Show 23: The Captain Edition
description:
The MLB The Show 23 Captain Edition on PlayStation includes:

A copy of the full game for PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4
New Era MLB The Show 9FIFTY limited edition cap
Limited edition SteelBook
Four days early access
Double daily login rewards (for the life cycle of MLB The Show 23)
Additional digital items:
Captain’s Choice Pack (x1)
To be announced Choice Pack (x1)
To be announced Uniform Choice Pack (x1)
Gold Choice Packs (x2)
Show Packs (x5)
Ballplayer Pack (x1)
Derek Jeter Cover art bat skin (x1)
10,000 Stubs

name: Alpha Warrior
description: Alpha Warrior is a retro, space shooter where the player engages in flight combat with enemy terrestrials and arcade style bosses. Blast your way through 12 exciting levels while stacking power-ups to become the most feared pilot in the galaxy.

name: Living with Horses: My Horse Farm
description: Run your own riding stable full of horses and take good care of your animals and your guests. Ride freely around the open game world, through a wide variety of landscapes. The riding controls are intuitive. Speed, skill and courage are required for the mounted games – riding games that are both thrilling and fun! Train hard and claim victory in the tournament!

name: Trash Horror Collection 3
description: We bring you 10 short horror/comedy games in this collection. Inspired by the "Tales From the Crypt" series and cult horror movies from the 80's/90's.

name: PowerShift
description: Speed across the shadownet desert at speed in the minimalist, 2.5D retro racer POWERSHIFT

name: Tofu'Drift
description:
In this challenging arcade driving game, you have to collect all the red cubes with your car. Sounds easy enough, right? But you only have 10 seconds to complete each level.
Can you manage all 15 levels?

name: Boreal Tenebrae Deluxe
description: Boreal Tenebrae will take you on a retro-style adventure, with a mysterious atmosphere and horror elements. The game is inspired by 90s classics and the best TV series.

name: Wars Across the World: Zulu 1879
description: Zulu 1879 recreates the British military campaign leading up to the destruction of the belligerent Zulu kingdom in South Africa in 1879. The British and their allies must quickly seize the enemy capital Ulundi or capture the Zulu king.

name: Sweet Bakery Tycoon: Multiplayer Edition
description:
Start your baking career and prepare some delicious cakes for your clients, using a whole set of creams, fruits, and decorations. Test your skills on 60 diverse and increasingly difficult levels. Personalize your interior with countless upgrades.

All of us have a magic place, where everyday troubles seem to disappear. Sweet Bakery Tycoon fulfills your fantasy of creating and managing a bakery of your dreams

name: Sweet Bakery Tycoon: Multiplayer Mode
description:
Join forces with your friend in the ultimate cooking adventure with this new Multiplayer Mode!

This DLC features an exciting local multiplayer gameplay mode, allowing players to team up and play together. It adds a new layer of excitement and replayability to the game, while providing a fun and engaging experience for players to enjoy with friends and family.

name: Nix: Ashes of the Phoenix
description: Ashes of the Phoenix is a survivor style, Roguelite ARPG experience set in a dark high fantasy world. The story follows Nix, a mysterious heroine (or is she?), as she battles her way through hordes of enemies to uncover the mystery that is the world around her.

name: Wretched Depths
description: Play as Sam and fish to your hearts content, sell fish you've caught, collect better gear, and use it to explore the depths of the mysterious lake, but be warned as no one knows what lies at the bottom. Wretched Depths is a PSX-style horror fishing game created by students at the University of Utah.

name: Violations Will Be Punished
description: An old-school turn-based strategy game with a philosophical story set in the dystopian 23rd century Solar System. You start as a cog in a corporation, search for meaning, and eventually become the mastermind of humanity.

name: Detective Solitaire: Butler Story 2
description: A detective world and solitaire! Explore the locations of an ancient mansion.

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R - Keicho Nijimura
description: Command your own army with Keicho Nijimura's stand Worse Company, now available in All-Star Battle R! Mobilize Keicho's troops, tanks, and helicopters to blow your opponents away!

name: Quiz Thiz Germany: Silver Edition
description: Are you the new quiz master and can you beat your friends on this quiz? Answer questions about this country and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about this country while playing!

name: Revival Quest
description: To save their hometown from being shutdown, Ravilla and Tyris must do everything in their power to revive the town's once thriving mine and revive Elsinki to its former glory. Another classic RPG from developer ShiroKuroSoft!

name: Hentai Journey
description: Hentai Journey - is a simple puzzle game with musical accompaniment where you can relax and enjoy pictures of girls on gallery after complete level

name: Uzzuzzu My Pet
description: Hop into the lives of four adorable animals. Uzzuzzu My Pet lets you experience a wacky world of absurd scenarios. Relax and sink into the world they inhabit.

name: Isle of Jura Fishing Trip
description: Visit the remarkable Isle of Jura and catch some delicious fish!

name: Devil Slayer: Raksasi - Incarnation of Darkness
description: A mysterious person used an ancient technique to create eight beings from Soul Crystals. These beings became known as the Charim—a race whose far more arduous trials take place in the [Incarnation of Darkness].

name: Bullet Runner: The First Slaughter
description: Big fucking guns + twin-stick action = Bullet Runner! Combine crazy movement and combat mechanics to dodge, slide, swing and shoot your way to victory! Brutal attacks, adrenaline, speed, power; you get them all. Free to play 4-hour single player campaign and an endless arena mode.

name: Apewar
description: Apewar is an online tactical and action FPS/TPS monkey war game adapted from real life. Build your monkey team and fight against your enemies. By playing in a coordinated way, you can have fun and win with a good strategy. Monkeys are strong together!

name: Not the Hero
description: Not the Hero - Yes, you are not the hero in this story, neither are you the right guy. but you will be doing it anyway!

name: Black Reliquary
description: Black Reliquary is a total conversion mod for Darkest Dungeon, one which makes sweeping overhauls to gameplay, adds a new story, a new setting, new narration, new music, new enemies, and so very much more. Embark into the distant east and uncover the ancient secrets of the Black Reliquary!

name: Goose Ronnie
description: "Goose Ronnie" is an exciting and amusing platformer game that takes you on a journey with the beloved character, Ronnie the Goose. In this game, Ronnie must navigate through various landscapes, all while avoiding dangers and collecting points.

name: Dirty Room
description: First person shooter horror adventure game. As detective C, you arrived at an old friend's home and try to find out what's going on.

name: Heartbite: Dating by Daylight
description: Get to know a unique cast of characters in Heartbite: Dating in Daylight! Escape from a dire situation, collect candy and witness a decisive battle as you get closer to them. Behold stunning locations, uncover secrets and get a taste of different genre minigames in this dating sim!

name: Vampire Story
description: Vampire Story - this is a 2D RPG with elements of survival in which you will need to complete the tasks of the demon you serve.

name: Hentai Snowy
description: Hentai Snowy is a relaxing puzzle game. With the theme of snow girl and 24 unique sexy girls. Enjoy sexy girls pictures and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: Shade: The Border Collie Flycatcher
description: Shade The Border Collie Flycatcher is an exciting point and shoot game that challenges players to catch as many flies as possible.

name: Lust Girl
description: Lust Girls is a casual puzzle game. There are 12 beautiful girls with different characteristics in the game. Enjoy the time of jigsaw puzzle with them.

name: Avoid It!
description: Every situation has a way out!

name: Sunny-Place-3: Microgods
description: Welcome to the plains of eternal dissent, fight honourable wars in this micro focused action RTS. Compete against other players in 1v1 skirmishes on the tracks towards Glory.

name: Aqua Marbles: Ocean
description: Deep in the abyss of the ocean lies an underwater kingdom. Dive into a submarine atmosphere complete with colorful graphics and exciting music, but keep an eye out! In the deepest darkest corners lie sunken ships and castles full of danger. Check out match-3 from a fresh perspective!

name: Yuki-iro Sign
description: A story of three girls and one season in the snowy town of Minamiouse.

name: Atham Battle Simulator
description: Fight your way to glory by conquering humans, demons & corrupted veggies in "Atham Battle Simulator". Don't let the bananas scare you from not playing this!

name: Urban Flow: Deluxe Edition
description: Urban Flow is a game about the subtle beauty of city streets filled with cars moving in perfect harmony. But such order does not happen all by itself - the city needs you to control the traffic lights and to make sure everything goes smoothly. That means no crashes, no jams. Everything will run perfectly - as long as you stay focused!

name: Hearth's Light: Potion Shop
description: A cozy, casual potion-making and shop-managing game, that is complimented by an array of deep mechanics to keep crafting potions satisfying and interesting regardless of how many times you've done it.

name: Atelier Ryza 3: Alchemist of the End & the Secret Key - Ultimate Edition
description: The story begins when a group of islands called Kark Isles appear near Ryza's—the protagonist's—hometown. Seeing this as a threat to their home, Ryza and her friends investigate the isles and discover ruins with a huge gate. Just as Ryza approaches the gate, a strange voice echoes in her head, telling her to reach the Code of the Universe. What is it that lies beyond the gate, and what does the "Code of the Universe" mean? In hopes of finding a way to save their home, Ryza and her friends set off on a great adventure that revolves around a Key and the roots of alchemy.

name: Planet Fights
description: An online MMO game in which you can have your own virtual life. You can join a nation, buy vehicles, items, properties, open a political party, fight in battlefields, participate in races, take part in agent fights, be a nation senator or president, vote on nation issues and you can do many other activities.

name: Atelier Ryza 3: Alchemist of the End & the Secret Key - Digital Deluxe Edition
description: The story begins when a group of islands called Kark Isles appear near Ryza's—the protagonist's—hometown. Seeing this as a threat to their home, Ryza and her friends investigate the isles and discover ruins with a huge gate. Just as Ryza approaches the gate, a strange voice echoes in her head, telling her to reach the Code of the Universe. What is it that lies beyond the gate, and what does the "Code of the Universe" mean? In hopes of finding a way to save their home, Ryza and her friends set off on a great adventure that revolves around a Key and the roots of alchemy.

name: Wonder Trips
description: Wonder Trips is designed to take you into different lands to enjoy many trips and activities. Have Lot Of Fun by riding, racing, para-sailing and more... It's time to discover different wonderlands and enjoy your own trips.

name: Cut the Head off the Snake
description: This is a race against time game, in this game, you can collect gold to restore your health and improve your combat ability, the time to defeat the boss is limited, if you don't beat the boss in the allotted time, the challenge will fail

name: MLB The Show 23: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Pre-order to get the Gold Choice pack and four days’ early access to start playing MLB The Show 23 from March 24 2023

This edition includes:
• Four Days Early Access.
• One World Baseball Classic Choice Pack.
• One World Baseball Classic Uniform Choice Pack.
• One Captain’s Choice Pack.
• One TBA Choice Pack.
• One TBA Uniform Choice Pack.
• Five Gold Choice packs.
• 20 The Show packs.
• One Ballplayer pack.
• Double daily login rewards.
• 30K Stubs.

MLB The Show 23 gets you closer than ever to living your Baseball dreams on the diamond. Shock The Game and Own The Show with your favorite players, your favorite rivalries, and all your favorite MLB moments.

name: Aery VR: A Journey Beyond Time
description: In Aery – A Journey Beyond Time you are in the role of a flying god-like creature which observes the world and their inhabitants while they grow and evolve through time. Are you ready to explore time itself?

name: Entrepreneurial tycoon
description: 《Entrepreneurial tycoon》 is a tycoon like game that breaks away from the traditional round playing method of tycoons and builds on the basis of three-dimensional city. The abundant props and events in the game can definitely bring players an unprecedented experience.

name: Out of the Park Baseball 24
description: The 24th release of Out of the Park Developments' award-winning sports strategy franchise. Officially licensed by MLB, the MLB Players Inc., and KBO.

name: Monster Racing League
description:
Multiplayer combat racing, with no driving!

Monster Racing League is a madcap multiplayer racing game made for maximum fun.
Let your monster drive while you activate offensive and defensive abilities to foil your rivals.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Fantasy 2
description: Fantasy images!

name: Death's Dungeon
description: Survive the onslaught of Death's Dungeon in a rogue-like dungeon crawler with RPG elements. Shoot and melee your way through various dungeons with four different classes.

name: Fairy Biography 3: Obsession
description: An casual strategy game. By using the demon pot to lure, the naughty demon spirits will be fooled and show their feet. Players use the left mouse button to click to control the demon refining pot, so that the demon refining pot can rebound reasonably and successfully defeat the enemy.

name: Knights of Legends
description: Classic turn-based strategy game!

name: Mei Qi 2020
description: The MeiQi Series is an episodic mystery game. This collection contains all of Season2/3/4 and 5,which will be released in 2020,and a special episode. In total there are 25 chapters.

name: Resident Evil 4: Lenticular Edition
description:
Resident Evil 4 is a remake of the 2005 original Resident Evil 4 reimagined for 2023 to bring state-of-the-art survival horror. Resident Evil 4 preserves the essence of the original game, while introducing modernized gameplay, a reimagined storyline,
and vividly detailed graphics to make this the latest survival horror game where life and death, terror and catharsis intersect.

name: Resident Evil 4: Steelbook Edition
description: A physical-only edition containing the Deluxe Edition of the game in a steelbook, digital soundtrack, figure, artbook, poster, and box.

name: Resident Evil 4: Collector's Edition
description: A physical-only edition containing the Deluxe Edition of the game in a steelbook, digital soundtrack, figure, artbook, poster, and box.

name: Resident Evil 4: Deluxe Edition
description: Comes with the base game, as well as bonus costumes, deluxe weapons, a treasure map, in-game sunglasses, and the option to swap to the original version of the game's soundtrack.

name: Atelier Ryza 3: Alchemist of the End & the Secret Key
description: Ryza and her friends are living their lives on Kurken Island when news of a sudden appearance of a mysterious group of islands in nearby waters arrives. To find a way to save her island, Ryza and her friends will set off on final adventure surrounding the "roots of alchemy."

name: Can of Wormholes
description: Push, slice, ingest, flip, and squish worms in this puzzle game in which you play as a little sentient tin can.

name: Steel Defier
description: Are you ready to escape from your thigh prison cell? A malfunction in the defense system of a transport spaceship accidentally killed everyone aboard, except for one last survivor… You and your suspiciously orange suit.

name: The Crown of Wu
description:
"The Crown of Wu" (or simply Crown of Wu) is a 3D third-person adventure-action, puzzles and platforms game.

Get ready to explore a new world inspired by Journey to the West, a traditional Chinese tale about the Monkey King, Sun Wukong. You’ll explore the future-past fantasy world as Sun Wukong, fighting alone against enemies and overcoming complex obstacles to retrieve the great Crown stolen by the antagonist Zhu. With Zhu waiting to fight and kill you, will you be able to get back the Crown and save your world from destruction?

name: Strange Town
description: Strange town is a very fun Multiplayer and local multiplayer role-playing game. You must find who the werewolf is in the morning and at night, you must fight and survive. Of course, hiding is a good option too.

name: Deflector
description: Deflector is a high-octane bullet hell roguelite set in a deadly world. Upgrade your characters with the DNA you find, evolve them further during your runs and explore the farthest reaches of this microcosm… or die trying.

name: Grappin
description: After a difficult awakening, you stumble upon the Grip, a mysterious artifact and grappling hook. Climb up the Mountain to bring back the Grip to the top and unravel the mystery surrounding the Grip. Bon voyage!

name: Galaxy Kart
description: Gear up, strap in, and prepare for the ultimate VR racing experience with Galaxy Kart VR. Whether you're a seasoned racer or a newcomer to the genre, get ready to embark on an unforgettable journey through the cosmos where victory awaits at every turn!

name: Misericorde: Volume One
description:
The year is 1482.

The age of exploration and enlightenment is on the distant horizon and the Renaissance is in full swing across Europe; but in England, the War of the Roses is in its final throes. Change is coming, but in one little convent in the north of the kingdom, everyone has seemed blissfully unaware.

Everyone except Sister Catherine, a beloved nun and firebrand thinker who has just been murdered. In an isolated monastery with an already mysterious reputation, any one of the Sisters could be the killer—and Mother Superior is as stumped as anyone else. That's where you come in.

As an Anchoress, you took an oath to never leave your cell; to devote yourself entirely to God and provide spiritual support to all who came to your door. But as the only Sister who couldn't possibly have committed the crime, you have a new mission: solve the case, before the bishop shutters the convent and the killer goes unpunished.

The Superior hasn't told everyone why you've suddenly joined the regular congregation, but something tells you most of these women know exactly what's going on. Who can you trust? Who is being honest, and who has their guard up—and why? Is the convent really haunted? Who killed Sister Catherine? And worst of all... are you next?

name: Buildest
description: Take on the role of an architect in different historical eras. Lead a brigade of honest hard workers to build it - from modest hovels for peasants to pompous skyscrapers of megacities.

name: Resident Evil 4
description:
Resident Evil 4 is a remake of the 2005 original Resident Evil 4 reimagined for 2023 to bring state-of-the-art survival horror. Resident Evil 4 preserves the essence of the original game, while introducing modernized gameplay, a reimagined storyline,
and vividly detailed graphics to make this the latest survival horror game where life and death, terror and catharsis intersect.

name: Endless
description: A Horror Adventure Game with Multiple Endings.

name: Earth Defense Force 6: Additional Mission Pack 1 - Lost Days
description:
EDF6 Additional Mission Pack 1.
Over 70 new weapons can be acquired by those who aspire to overcome a true challenge. Includes 5 difficulty levels + online co-op play.

name: Funny Rain
description:
Ichihashi Sanae lost his wife and daughter in an accident one year ago. After their deaths, Sanae loses his will to live, is diagnosed with depression, and begins to have suicidal thoughts.

He is no longer able to work or even do simple household chores, but there is someone who takes care of him.

It is Sakamaki Yura, the younger brother of his wife Yumi.

name: Blok Shot VR
description:
Embark on an interstellar journey with Block Shot VR, where the cosmos is your playground and every shot counts. Dive into a visually mesmerizing universe, complete with vibrant planets, pulsating audio, and challenging block adversaries that stand in your way. See you on the leaderboard! ​

Highlights of Block Shot VR:

​Dynamic Shooting: Challenge your reflexes and accuracy as you target and blow-up floating blocks and bombs.​Time-Based Challenges: With the clock ticking, every second matters. Strategize your shots, earn points, and strive for the highest score before time runs out. The Armory Awaits: After each victorious round, venture to the Store and use points to buy more lives and better weapons! ​Audio Emission: Vibe with the music and the blocks oscillating, vibrant colors Leaderboards: Compete against players worldwide and see how your skills stack up on the global leaderboards. Regular Updates:

name: Ace Attorney: Ultimate Justice
description: Ultimate Justice is a fan-made crossover between the murder mysteries franchise of Ace Attorney and Danganronpa. It will follow the lawyers of the Wright Anything Agency as they defend students of Hope’s Peak in various murder cases.

name: Resident Evil 4: Extra DLC Pack
description:
The Resident Evil 4: Extra DLC Pack is included in the Deluxe Edition and contains all the launch DLC available for the game, excluding the pre-order bonuses and the various upgrade ticket microtransactions.

The bundle adds the 'Casual' and 'Romantic' costumes for Leon and Ashley, the 'Hero' and 'Villain' costumes for Leon with screen filters, Leon's sunglasses, the deluxe weapons 'Sentinel Nine' and 'Skull Shaker', the treasure map expansion and the Original Ver. Soundtrack Swap which adds an option to change the games music and sound effects to the 2005 version.

name: Wonder Wheel
description: This is a wad of 4 maps; they are vaguely nature-themed and about 10 minutes and 100 monsters long each. No gameplay changes. Balanced for pistol starts.

name: Lofi Ball: Wipeout
description: This DLC will give you 10 more levels to play and some more customization for your ball

name: Over OBJ
description: Homebrew SHMUP game that tries to deliver huge amount of objects on screen at the same time.

name: Ghost Signal: A Stellaris Game
description: Ghost Signal is a VR action roguelite set in the Stellaris universe, where you captain your ship to battle a multitude of alien species. Partake in dynamic space wars, encounter planet sized creatures, gather valuable loot to conduct research, and more. No journey is the same. Will you find the origins of the mysterious Ghost Signal?

name: Yandere Ura-kano Jirai-chan
description: Sin descripción

name: G-Mode Archives 46: Keitai Shoujo: Koi+Hime - Koi ni Ochita Cinderella-hime
description:
Those shoes are cursed if a fake wears...? A princess romance adventure in a sound novel style.

When I woke up, I was alone in the dark wilderness. In the bag I was holding, there were dolls and glass shoes...

The main character with glass shoes is attacked by a "masked man" on the way and escapes from his life, and meets a girl.
In the house where she lives, there are girls with familiar faces...

"Mobile Phone Girl - Love + Princess - Princess Cinderella Who Fell in Love" is a love simulation "Mobile Phone Girl" Gaiden work. It is a princess-like romance adventure game in a sound novel format that incorporates romantic comedy x suspense x moe elements in the Grimm's fairy tale "Cinderella" that everyone knows.

Among the heroines, the story revolves around "Sayo Tomoe" which has a quiet and mysterious atmosphere.
The main character "Hiro Aida" is attracted to her and gets involved in a certain incident.
Please enjoy the mysterious and glamorous world that is a bit different from the brilliant youth story depicted in the previous work.

name: And I Saw the Stars Falling Down...
description:
A woman narrates the story of a family and the abuse behind, and how everyone tries to convince you it's not their fault. But you don't know who to believe. You can't even trust the narrator. Especially the narrator.

A drama/mystery visual novel around 15k words, including 20 CGs with over 13 variations in total. Bonus content for people who decide to use accessibility tools (Turn off animations & Sound Captions)!

There's also a secret (horror?) route hidden in the game!

name: Rapid Fire Brigade
description:
Rapid Fire Brigade, the ultimate retro shooter experience!

Embark on an exhilarating journey in Rapid Fire Brigade, the ultimate retro arcade shooter game that promises hours of addictive, action-packed gameplay. Conquer captivating levels, become an arcade hero, and immerse yourself in a world filled with intense battles and strategic decisions.

Begin with basic weapons and gradually upgrade your arsenal to an unbeatable powerhouse. Complete missions to earn rewards, enhance your character, and master an array of formidable weapons. Make smart choices by selecting the right weapons and power-ups for each mission, upgrading your character, and unlocking new abilities in the skill tree to boost your firepower.

Experience challenging levels brimming with secrets, formidable bosses, and enthralling gameplay twists! Revel in stunning retro-inspired graphics and effects that transport you back in time.

name: Maimai DX Festival Plus
description:
The updated version of maimai Deluxe Festival.

General Information / Changes:
- Favorite songs can now be registered on the maimaiでらっくすNET website, and they will appear in a special category in-game.
- Rivals can now be set, in order to challenge other players' high scores.
- Extra area travel distance after reaching the Task Track is now stored.
- When using tickets that increase area travel distance, MASTER and Re:MASTER charts are now playable directly.
- Track skip options are now accessible for the life values that would be seen in a Perfect Challenge (Life 300 down to Life 1).
- New display option in the centre of the screen: DX Score (subtractive type), showing the maximum obtainable DX Score. In addition, when using the Judgement Breakdown display, the number of Critical Perfect is separated from the number of Perfect.
- Note effect volume changes: TOUCH notes are separated into their own category, and the note sound volume for BREAK SLIDE notes can be adjusted too.
- In Invitation Play, ADVANCED charts can now be selected.
- On the splash screen before starting a song, BPM, chart designer name, and current record are now displayed.
- On the last track of a credit, the top light will change it color to red to indicate it is the last track.

name: Conexus
description:
Conexus is a short Yume Nikki fangame that follows a young adventurer who mysteriously awakes in a realm of interconnected worlds named the Conexus.

Uncover the reason why you were brought to the Conexus, and learn about the realm's history along the way. Or if you don't feel like performing story errands, just treat it like a digital museum instead.

This game features 17 unique areas to explore, with lots of weird things to see and people to meet everywhere you go.

Unlike the typical Yume Nikki fangame, there aren't any "effects" to find here, instead all of the focus is placed on touring a fully open realm where every path leads to somewhere else.

name: The Legend of Zelda: The Sealed Palace
description:
An Ocarina of Time romhack.

Lots of gameplay in various areas and dungeons with custom cutscenes, songs and much more. Good luck finding all 100 skulltula tokens and 20 hearts!

name: Dungeons & Dragons Bundle
description: Dive into award-winning Dungeons & Dragons RPG classics, enhanced for modern adventurers! Immerse yourself in epic RPGs where every choice matters. Your adventure awaits with these five enhanced editions…

name: MiniCar Extreme: Car Driving Racing (Truck, Suv, Sedan, Cars)
description: This game gives you the feeling that such a real race without rules. Difficult battles against each other will provide you with very vivid emotions. A variety of cars and racing tracks will not let you get bored while playing. For practice, you can check out the Arcade mode. And for the more adventurous and experienced, there is an mode Championship with different tipe of deficlty. The Versus game mode will give you the opportunity to fight with your friends. Different abilities you can pickup , both useful and interfering with your victory, will not let you relax.

name: Voice of Cards Trilogy
description:
Voice of Cards is a quirky series of RPGs where the whole world is depicted through the medium of cards.

The Voice of Cards Trilogy bundles together all three titles from the series; Voice of Cards: The Isle Dragon Roars, Voice of Cards: The Forsaken Maiden and Voice of Cards: The Beasts of Burden.

name: Not for Broadcast: Deluxe Edition
description: The award-winning Not For Broadcast, now including the DLC Season Pass.

name: Crime Busters: Strike Area
description: A single-player top down game that fights against terrorists around the world! Do a battle and play with each other for up to maximum 2 people!

name: Air Hockey Arcade: Casual Board Game
description: Classic arcade sport board game where you can challenge both AI and your friends!

name: Magic World: Unravel the Magic
description: A magical world where you can choose between 4 different characters, will you be a good apprentice magician or will you sow chaos in the school of magic and sorcery?

name: Figment 1 + Figment 2
description: Figment is an action-adventure set in the recesses of the human mind... Welcome to the world of Figment. A strange and surreal world; a place filled with our deepest thoughts, urges and memories, populated by the many voices we hear in our heads.

name: The Ripper: Serial Killers
description: Remember that voice in your head telling you to do the wrong thing? That voice is you. Guide the protagonist and whisper in his ear whether to spare the lives of the citizens or murder them

name: Yello Adventures
description: Overcome challenging and dangerous platforms with a variety of different and challenging enemies and make sure you are prepared for the boss at the end of the level where you will show your experience and expertise! Spend the money you get from enemies in the in-game store, upgrade your weapon and become more effective in your fight against your enemies!

name: Arcade Archives: Bonze Adventure
description: Bring your buddhist beads on this journey to hell and back!

name: Tasty Slot Machine
description:
You start with 1,000 coins - the aim of the game is to wager your coins to try and increase your coins as high as you can. Pick the number of pay lines and then how much the bet per line will be. Then cross your fingers and press spin.
If you win on a spin, you can either Take Win or choose to Double of Nothing in a simple game of Red or Black. Keep playing until you run out of coins or want to Cash Out and register your rank in the Leaderboards!

name: Lucky Slots
description: Lucky Slot is a single player quick-play game that is fun for all the family - keeping Vegas-style slots in a fun and safe way for all.

name: Celebrity Slot Machine
description: Celebrity Slot Machine is a single player quick-play game that is fun for all the family - keeping Vegas-style slots in a fun and safe way for all.

name: Atelier Ryza 3: Endless Summer Splash! Costume Set
description: Swimsuits for Ryza and her friends! Adds 11 swimsuits, one for each party member.

name: Shuttle World
description: Shuttle World is a third person simulation business game. I believe that most people are struggling to achieve financial freedom and strive to become the boss of the richest party; When the penniless you come to a strange city, please use your wisdom, arrange your time reasonably, and strive to live

name: Childhood Dreams: Jigsaw Puzzle - Expansion Pack 1
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Childhood Dreams: Jigsaw Puzzle
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Bitsy
description: Bitsy is a 3D stealth puzzle game where you play as a mechanized spider completing contracts in a futuristic world. Climb walls, leap and web sling around tough obstacles, and above all: avoid detection.

name: The House of E.
description: The House of E. is a story-driven puzzle game with horror elements and a creepy atmosphere.

name: Ultimate Ball
description: Completely simulate the physical laws of the real world, by building different structures, let the ball as fast as possible to the end! Try as many solutions as you can, and see who can get to the finish line in less time than your friends!

name: The Penguin Game: Antarctic Savior
description: Collect air conditioners, save Antarctica! Only you can save penguins. Antarctic savior! This is an open world adventure game with various contents such as sports mini-games, FPS, boss battles, item farming, quests, platformers, and puzzles.

name: Project Liminal Redux
description: Project Liminal Redux is a first-person horror made in realistic 3D graphics. The gameplay consists of collecting notes, solving riddles and escaping from various entities. The main goal is to survive and escape.

name: Birds and Blocks 2
description: The Birds are back with 120 new levels!

name: Hentai Puzzle Quest
description: Hentai Puzzle Quest is a game that aims to relax through art and lofi music.

name: Pokémon Añil
description: Pokémon Añil is the fourth video game created by EricLostie after "Pokémon Opalo". Kanto returns, but this time from a perspective never seen before, with a much deeper story and improved graphics.

name: Loud: My Road to Fame - My Trip to Japan
description: Grab your guitar and get ready to get big in Japan in the first DLC to the arcade rhythm-music game LOUD: My Road to fame this time with music from famous japanese artists.

name: PlanetSprite
description: PlanetSprite is an online MMO where you create your own character, customize, interact, trade and play with other fellow players!

name: Hidden World 4 Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Bang Bang Land
description: Take part in a number of marksmanship challenges while you explore Bang Bang Land an abandoned theme park designed by a Gun Nut that had to be closed down due to serious Health & Safety concerns! Can you help it to reopen?

name: Final Gun
description: Experience the ultimate adrenaline-fueled rush with Final Gun - the fast-paced, multiplayer top-down shooter game where you engage in an epic arms race with other players as you fight for the title of the ultimate gun master.

name: The Cure
description: The Cure is a hardcore 3D shooter with surviving elements where you must survive in zombie apocalypse.

name: Slide Puzzle: Cute Moe Girls
description: Cute girl slide puzzle

name: Scramballed!
description: Smash your friends in the face with eggs in the ultimate chicken showdown! Control a cast of quirky cluckers and compete in a wacky version of tennis.

name: Farm Empire
description: Would you like to be the world's richest farmer? In Farm Empire, you'll start your own farm from scratch, but with the right strategy, you'll soon have an entire empire.

name: Athenian Rhapsody: Thunder Goober's Personality Dungeon
description: Athenian Rhapsody: Thunder Goober's Personality Dungeon is a dangerously goofy RPG with fast paced, unique combat and zany secrets and adventures. Your goal is to build your own rhapsody, the story of you - the player - an experience which cannot be replicated by others.

name: Numolition
description:
Set up... add up... and blow up!
An explosively addicting puzzle game starring Anique and her crew of demolition experts. With its unique, clever gameplay, cast of wacky characters and comic style, Numolition is a guaranteed blast for the whole family!

Your job is simple: flatten as many constructions as you can by setting up, adding up and blowing up the numbers 1 to 9 through loads of mind-bending levels, bonus challenges, endless towers and other unlockable game modes that offer endless replayability.

name: Poor Bunny!
description: Poor Bunny! Is a silly little highscore chaser where you control a cute little bunny who must eat all the tasty carrots while avoiding rapidly appearing traps. How long can you survive before you get overwhelmed?

name: Resoraki
description: Resoraki is a simple racing game. Play alone or with a friend (offline/online) and race in Poland, Finland, Australia or Greece. Different modes game like championship, arcade and time trial. The graphics combine anime, cartoon and comic styles.

name: House of Jigsaw: Masters of Art
description: Imagine yourself being in the greatest musea by solving the Jigsaw Puzzles of master artists like Monet, Haring, Kadinsky, Hokusai, Rousseau and Rembrandt. All major art style are represented in more dan 100 high quality puzzles. Enjoy the modern UI and 4 difficulty levels (30/120/300/600 pieces).

name: The Dragon Queen
description: Enola has lived her own life on a small village secluded from the rest of the world. But soon this will change!

name: Blood Rite
description: A gruesome human resources game. Mine gems to spawn new minions. Sacrifice these minions to keep ahead of the fire. Then use their blood for special powers like shields, power-ups, and daggers to defeat incoming foes. Towers will turn minions into archers, electrocutioners or human crossbow bolts.

name: Sushi Bar Express
description:
Experience the dizzying life of a top sushi chef as you prepare sushi dishes in this exciting time-management cooking adventure.

Serve hordes of demanding patrons and build-up your menu by purchasing more recipes, to take with you to bigger and better restaurants.

Start a career as a sushi chef and absorb all of the wise teachings of your master. Slice, dice, roll and hammer sushi, and then serve it to customers as quickly as you can. Make sashimi, roll uramaki, pour sake, and feed the hungry hordes to collect cash. Catch coins as they fly by, and use the money you make to upgrade your equipment and purchase more recipes.

The characters and tone of Sushi Bar Express are presented in a light-hearted and comical style, designed to appeal to all types of players – ranging from children to adults, and all genders. Whimsical humour offers a counterpoint to the manic plate-juggling gameplay and helps players to feel comfortable and entertained throughout the game.

name: Not for Broadcast VR
description: Get closer to the truth than ever in the VR edition of Not For Broadcast. Keep the cameras rolling, censor the swears and immerse yourself in the powerful, alluring and occasionally deadly world of broadcast television news.

name: How I Escaped Futa Prison
description: How I Escaped Futa Prison is a top-down shooter where you play as a futa escaping from prison. Shoot your way through the prison and slap your enemies with your giant penis.

name: Not For Broadcast: Live & Spooky
description: Direct the "Live & Spooky" paranormal investigation team around a derelict film studio deep underneath Channel One. Frame the shots, capture the action and help keep viewers on the edge of their seats with some TV magic. After all, these ghost shows are all just a hoax... right?

name: SD Shin Kamen Rider Rumble
description: SD Shin Kamen Rider Rumble will be coming to the Nintendo Switch and Steam! Based on the upcoming movie airing in Japan this March, Shin Kamen Rider, the new beat em' up/hack and slash game will showcase the fight between Kamen Rider and Shocker in a SD visual style.

name: Mr. Saitou
description: A short game set in the Rakuen universe about an average white-collar worker who struggles to find meaning in a life full of constant overtime and isolation. After an accident lands him in the hospital, Mr. Saitou is spirited away to a strange fantasy world where an unexpected friend takes him on a life-changing adventure.

name: Puttzzle
description: Putt your ball in it!

name: R-Type Final 3 Evolved: Deluxe Edition
description: Deluxe Edition includes R-Type Final 3 Evolved game, “Discovery” 1-disc Soundtrack, Softcover Art book.

name: R-Type Final 3 Evolved: Special Edition
description: Special Edition includes R-Type Final 3 Evolved Limited Edition, "Starfighter" 2-disc Soundtrack and a R-9A Arrowhead Keychain Light

name: R-Type Final 3 Evolved
description:
R-Type Final 3 Evolved serves simultaneously as a sequel to R-Type Final 2, offering a whole new 7-stage campaign made in the engine of Final 2, whilst also serving as a compilation of most of content released for R-Type Final 2.

Additional features such as R-Park, an online area where one can interact with other players.

name: Survivors: Three Kingdoms
description: Play with characters from the Three Kingdoms, FIGHT with infinite numbers of enemies, and survive till the end! Make your favorite character to be the legendary hero of the Three Kingdoms by unique skills and various tactics. Fight together with royal adjutants in any battle.

name: Life After Magic
description:
"Life After Magic" is a Y2K, queer WLW visual novel focused around retired magical girls!

What's a magical girl to do when the teenage years are over, and there's no more bad guys for you to fight? How about navigating lost connections? Or juggling a totally awful retail gig? Worst of all - your magical powers are fading...

name: Creature Hunter
description: Produce powerful spells with the loot you collect. Destroy creatures that get stronger at each level with collective or single spells. Defend yourself with defensive spells. Cross deadly parkour with the spells you've crafted.

name: Turbo Shell
description: Turbo Shell is a fast-paced 2D platformer with a unique movement mechanic: instead of running and jumping, you push and pull yourself through levels with the help of a special device. Traverse through ever more challenging levels as Craig The Egg, collect rewards – and beat your friends' best time!

name: Storyteller
description: With Storyteller you are the one writing the stories! Start with a title, characters and settings and create your own twist on stories familiar and new.

name: West Hunt
description:
West Hunt is an online social deduction game set in the old west.
It's the perfect game to test your detective and stealth skills with your friends in quick exciting matches.

name: Ghostpia Season One
description:
"Ghostpia" is a visual novel with cute visuals that look like a picture book, adorned with glitches and noise, and characterized by nostalgic expressions!

This game is a more expressive and interactive reimagining of the visual novel "Ghostpia" that has been released on the App Store and web platforms.

name: Split
description: In the future, giant city-states have emerged, separated from each other by indestructible barriers. Most professions have been taken over by machines. People work mainly as mechanics, programmers or operators.

name: Sushi Bar Express
description:
Experience the dizzying life of a top sushi chef as you prepare sushi dishes in this exciting time-management cooking adventure.

Serve hordes of demanding patrons and build-up your menu by purchasing more recipes, to take with you to bigger and better restaurants.

Start a career as a sushi chef and absorb all of the wise teachings of your master. Slice, dice, roll and hammer sushi, and then serve it to customers as quickly as you can. Make sashimi, roll uramaki, pour sake, and feed the hungry hordes to collect cash. Catch coins as they fly by, and use the money you make to upgrade your equipment and purchase more recipes.

The characters and tone of Sushi Bar Express are presented in a light-hearted and comical style, designed to appeal to all types of players – ranging from children to adults, and all genders. Whimsical humour offers a counterpoint to the manic plate-juggling gameplay and helps players to feel comfortable and entertained throughout the game.

name: Mahjong Fight Girl
description: Sin descripción

name: Taurian Defense
description:
Inspired by 1980s top-down arcade-style shooters, in this game you must defend your bases from an enemy invasion. The future of colonization depends on you!

Pilot the most advanced Taurian defense ships, each with their own special capabilities to help drive back the invading forces.

name: Tao Yuan Shen Chu You Ren Jia
description: This game is a leisurely and soothing Chinese-style pastoral landscape management mobile game. The game is based on traditional culture, with a warm and healing theme, enriching the simple and unpretentious rural life with the aesthetics of lush green landscapes in the style of Chinese classical art, creating a simple and peaceful utopia.

name: Mouse Trap
description: Mouse Trap is back with a snap! It’s the chaotic board game you remember! Join your friends and race to collect the most cheese.

name: Gradually Jojo ni
description: A game where you play as a runner who is rushing to the goal. As you constantly speed up towards your goals, you may wonder to yourself, ‘what am I missing along my path?’ Slow down by pressing the button and you may see something you didn’t realize was there. Enjoy the environment and have a rest with simple interactions. Remember, the goal will always be there, and you can take your time.

name: Hellgineers
description: Help the minions of the underworld across bubbling pools of lava with rickety bridges and non-regulated constructions. Will you go for the easiest route, or test your skills and aim for the coveted skulls? Return to completed challenges to perfect your builds!

name: Learn the Letters
description: Sin descripción

name: Quiz Thiz Germany: Bronze Edition
description: Are you the new quiz master and can you beat your friends on this quiz? Answer questions about this country and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about this country while playing!

name: Superfidos
description: Help Kenny, Lenny, and Max save humanity in this adventure about courage and loyalty. Explore 8 interconnected worlds, fighting epic bosses, searching for upgrades, and powerful magic spells in this platforming game designed for the whole family.

name: Hitstun
description: Hitstun is a turn based fighting game with online matchmaking. Challenge your friends to an exciting battle with diverse characters and movesets.

name: Snowball Christmas Festival
description: Snowball Christmas festival is a puzzle game, the ultimate goal of which is to swap the blocks to collect the image. But remember, the purpose of this game is to let you relax and enjoy the process. To do this, we added a minimalistic interface and relaxing music.

name: Exit: The Game - Trial of the Griffin
description: An exciting Escape Room experience awaits you! Can you uncover the secrets of Greifenstein Castle and escape?

name: Super Kids Racing: Jungle Edition
description: Super Kids Racing : Jungle Edition offers wide variety of challenges with many different types of vehicles to choose from. Players will love to complete these challenges with their friends in split-screen multiplayer mode.

name: Backrooms Exploration
description: Traverse your way through this Atmospheric Psychological Horror! Explore the 9 eerie levels of The Backrooms, a place where everything seems familiar, with a constant feeling of something or someone watching you. Why were you chosen to enter The Backrooms?

name: Chinese Chess Party
description: Chinese Chess(Xiangqi) is no longer just a 1v1 game, Chinese Chess Party can support up to 4 players. You can play against the computer on a 1v1 game or even play a 2v2 team game with a computer teammate.

name: Cities: Skylines - Content Creator Pack: Africa in Miniature
description: Cities: Skylines presents Africa In Miniature: a Content Creator Pack set in the African Continent that includes 28 new buildings inspired by the existing urban masterpieces and unique architectural concepts.

name: Cities: Skylines - Content Creator Pack: Sports Venues
description: Sports season never ends with “Sports Venues”, a Content Creator Pack by community modder BadPeanut. From unique stadiums to community sports parks, this Content Creator Pack has everything you need to satisfy your City's needs for sports!

name: Cities: Skylines - Content Creator Pack: Shopping Malls
description: It's time for some retail extravaganza! With the Content Creator Pack “Shopping Malls” by community modder KingLeno you can bring your shopping experience to the next level, adding a variety of shopping areas to your City.

name: Sister
description: A gloomy story without words, inspired by poetry, masterpieces of painting from different countries and eras, as well as the aesthetics of Zvyagintsev's early films. About the love of a brother and sister, a harsh upbringing, the continuity of generations and the difficult lot of young people living in the outback. Comic-poem at the intersection of social drama and biblical parable.

name: Hidden Harbor 3 Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Farm Day 2023
description: Looking for a fun and addictive farming simulation game? Look no further than Farm Day 2023! Develop your farming capabilities, grow crops, and build your own town. With beautiful graphics and a relaxed gameplay style, it's perfect for players of all ages. Start your farming adventure today!

name: Hentai Pool
description: Hentai Girls is a jigsaw puzzle. You must use your wisdom to put the puzzle back to its original shape.

name: Shadow BoXR
description: Shadow BoXR is a rhythm boxing game intended to make working out fun. Punch the targets and dodge the obstacles all while rocking out to your favorite music. This is your workout built by you for you.

name: The Die Is Cast
description: The Die Is Cast is an interactive fiction set in a medieval-fantasy universe. You will have to balance your skills and make the right decisions to survive the scenario and reach your goal.

name: Pac-Man in a Tin
description: Pac-Man in a Tin is a pocket-sized tin contains the classic arcade game in all its 8-bit glory.

name: Kowloon's Curse: Lost Report
description: Explore a surreal world inspired by Kowloon Walled city in this turn-based RPG inspired by Japanese games from the Dreamcast and PS1-era.

name: Hidden Islands
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Have a Nice Death
description: Have a Nice Death is a 2D action roguelite where you play as an overworked Death, whose employees have run rampant, completely throwing off the balance of souls - and his vacation plans. In order to restore order, you'll have to grab your trusty scythe and show your employees who's boss.

name: Mighty Doom
description: Run and gun through hundreds of exciting levels and battle challenging bosses as you level up, gain powerful skills, loot new gear, and upgrade legendary weapons. Descend into iconic Doom worlds in this single-touch shooter with an animated style.

name: Grand Theft Auto Tightened Thrice
description: 'Tightened Thrice' is a 'Tightened Vice' prequel mod for GTA 3, that seeks to make every single mission in the game harder, with a focus on ruining the muscle memory of speedrunners...

name: Zoe The Exhibitionist
description: Zoe has locked herself out of her house...naked. Your job is to help her make the right choices that'll lead her to clothes without being seen by too many people in a Choose-Your-Own-Adventure ENF-Themed game with over 1,700 3D Images and voice acting. Includes 'A Night With Itsuki'

name: +1x2
description: A super simple clicker game with finite goal and few hours of fun. Will you be able to complete it in time to make a refund?

name: Pick the Star
description: "PICK THE STAR (10 liner)" is a multitasking arcade game for one player. The player must pick mostly the stars that descend from the top of the screen using the joystick.

name: Endless Thunder
description: Sin descripción

name: We Lost Our Human
description: We Lost Our Human is an interactive comedy adventure about two indoor pets, a cat named Pud and a dog named Ham, who finds that all humans have seemingly disappeared from Earth.

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Thornweaver Premium Pack
description:
Unlock the “Thornweaver” rider class with its new dragon and summon the elder forces of nature! The pack also includes two extra dragons, legendary gear, themed customisations, a hefty XP bonus and gems.

Full content of this pack:
Thornweaver Class
2 Epic Dragons (Thornweaver)
Legendary Weapon (Thornweaver)
Legendary Helmet (Thornweaver)
Themed Wallpaper
Themed Player Icon
30 Days Bonus XP
1000 Gems

name: P Rank 64
description: Play through sm64 with the P ranks from Pizza Tower! Defeat enemies and collect coins to keep your combo timer up while you collect all 6 stars in each level. If you want to shoot higher than P rank, collect the 100 coin star as well for the brand new M rank!

name: The Tale of Food
description: Embark on a 2-million-word fantasy adventure as the descendant of the Food God. Collect and nurture Food Souls as you explore time and space! Interact with them closely and record every precious moment.

name: Tchia: Kepler Customization Pack
description: The Kepler Customization Pack includes four costume sets for Tchia and four boat customization packs, inspired by fellow titles from the Kepler game catalogue.

name: The Hero with a Thousand Arms
description: The Hero with a Thousand Arms has created a challenging game where multiple mini-games are running simultaneously on the screen, and the player needs to switch between them to operate. Meanwhile, the other games enter bullet time mode.

name: R4 Ridge Racer Type 4
description:
Experience R4 Ridge Racer Type 4 originally released on the PlayStation console, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

High speed and stylish driving! That's what it takes to become the ultimate Ridge Racer!
The extremely popular PS game R4 Ridge Racer Type 4 marks its return on PS4 and PS5!
It is named R4 to indicate the fourth entry in the Ridge Racer series.
The basic gameplay follows the concept of the Ridge Racer series, a racing game where everyone can enjoy the excitement of high-speed control.
In the main game mode, players will be able to experience the life of a racer.

name: Ape Academy 2
description:
Experience Ape Academy 2 originally released on the PSP system, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

The apes have finally graduated from the Ape Academy, so this term things are going to be a little different! Evil genius Specter has invented a new card game and it’s sweeping the globe, helping him on his way towards world domination.

Get ready to mix it up with the monkeys using Specter’s ‘scissors, paper, rock’ cards – there are 300 to collect – before taking them on in over 100 fiendishly difficult mini-games. Just don’t underestimate the apes, no matter how silly they act; Specter has put an ultra-rare platinum monkey card up for grabs (not to mention a year’s supply of bananas) and they’ll do anything to claim the prize!

name: Train Sim World 3: Rail Operations Group BR Class 37/7
description: Take charge of the hardest working locomotives in Britain today; experience unique Unit Drag services, hauling EMUs to and from refurbishment, thrashing throughout the Medway Towns and beyond with Train Sim World 3: Rail Operations Group BR Class 37/7!

name: Train Sim World 3: DB BR 403 ICE 3 Railbow
description: Add a splash of colour and ride in high-speed pride on iconic ICE services; from the 10-year anniversary of DB's pride initiative, to the many parades and celebrations throughout Germany. Embrace love and diversity with Train Sim World 3: ICE 3 Railbow!

name: Train Sim World 3: BNSF SD70ACe
description: Tackle the harsh and mountainous grades of California in a modern masterpiece; experience heavy freight hauling aboard electro-motive power with an orange twist, battle the summit with Train Sim World 3: BNSF SD70ACe!

name: Marvel's Midnight Suns: The Hunger
description:
Marvel's Midnight Suns: The Hunger is the second DLC expansion for Marvel's Midnight Suns, released in January 2023. This DLC introduces the character Morbius, the Living Vampire, as a fully playable hero. Morbius brings a unique set of vampire-themed abilities to the game, focusing on life-stealing attacks, supernatural speed, and other vampiric powers.

The expansion includes new story missions that delve into Morbius's battle against Lilith's forces and his struggles with his vampiric nature.

name: FT Adventures
description: FT Adventures is a game about a robot who goes through various different types of platforms and environment levels and tries to complete those levels.

name: Run On Home
description: A short horror/comedy themed 2.5D platformer with puzzles, hostile enemies, and multiple endings. After reaching the end the first time you'll unlock the demon killing gun.

name: Point of Mew
description: A first pawson puzzle adventure! Play as a cat helping your sad human to build a toy boat out of trash and get through the day.

name: Syphon Filter: Dark Mirror
description: A port of Siphon Filter: Dark Mirror, originally released on the PlayStation Portable system, featuring optimised rendering, rewind, quick saving, and custom video filters.

name: Heart vs HP
description: Avoid all incoming obstacles while managing your HP! There are only 2 ways to die. One, is be hit by an obstacle, and two, when your HP is 0. Try to get as many points as possible to renew your high score!

name: Running Guys
description: A police officer, a thief, and a bag full of cash, with a hole in it. This is the story of a wild pursuit on this 2D platformer.

name: Words of Wisdom
description: Poetic, philosophical and challenging platformer experience? That's all about Words of Wisdow — innovative mix of hardcore platformer with text riddles and word puzzles.

name: Sex Simulator: Girl on Girl
description: An interactive sex simulation game, featuring high definition graphics and videos with realistic looking characters, set in a beautiful decor. You play the role of a sexy brunette, inviting three girls over at her glamorous apartment, for some wild same-sex experiences.

name: Beyond the Wall
description: Classic point-and-click adventure with a magical atmosphere. Discover what happens one night Beyond the Wall of the garden. Immerse yourself into a mysterious world where fantasy meets reality with a pinch of humor. Solve puzzles, collect items, and overcome obstacles that await you on your journey.

name: Volar
description: Help Volar outrun their past as you jump, smash, and power your way through levels in this one-button platformer that is *not* an autorunner. Explore 5 unique worlds, using collectable masks to ignite, freeze, electrocute, and more. Each level presents a new challenging twist to test your skills!

name: Ten Seconds Trillion
description: Ten Seconds Trillion is a unique clicker game with simple goals but addictive gameplay. Can you reach one trillion value just by clicking and buying upgrades?

name: Twell
description: This adventure is about you waking up in this world named Twell. The only thing you can do is explore what this world has to offer. Explore 8 unique dungeons, discover many secrets and visit many locations.

name: Amazing Trip to Europe
description: Search and Find hidden items while traveling across Europe!

name: Royal Romances: Forbidden Magic - Collector's Edition
description: Is it possible to overcome obstacles through hope or faith in love? Lead your valiant heroes through the thorny path to their most cherished desires and find out!

name: Goblin Keep
description: Voxel World Survival and Town Building game with building tools, combat, and destruction

name: Tchia: Oléti Edition
description: The Tchia: Oléti Edition comes with the Tchia base game and the Kepler Customization Pack, which includes four costume sets for Tchia and four boat customization packs, inspired by fellow titles from the Kepler game catalogue.

name: Farming Simulator 22: Göweil Pack
description: Take the joy of baling multiple steps further with Göweil! Operate a diversified set of professional baling and wrapping technology and equip your farm with nine new machines and tools. The Göweil Pack adds new possibilities while improving the quality and efficiency of your operation that depends on baling your valuable resources.

name: Unheard: Voices of Crime Edition
description: Put on your headphones and step back into the past. Use the voices you hear to return to crime scenes, tracking down each individual involved and solving the cases. But where do the voices come from? Can you trust what you hear? And what's the mysterious thread weaving all of these cases together?

name: Deceive Inc.: Black Tie Edition
description:
Dress to impress with the Deceive Inc. Black Tie Edition!

Every Black Tie Edition Includes:
Exclusive ‘Black Tie’ outfits for all 8 Agents
Custom ‘Black Tie’ Profile Portrait & Title
1,000 Deceive Inc. Bonds

name: The Walking Dead: Saints & Sinners - Ch 2: Retribution
description: Your tour through undead New Orleans continues in this new chapter to the Tourist’s story in The Walking Dead: Saints & Sinners. Hunted by the seemingly unstoppable Axeman and facing off against the Tower’s latest push for total dominance, discover what connects these new threats together before it’s too late. New faces, places, weapons and gear all await you on your journey to a final showdown for the city's fate. Do you have what it takes to survive it all?

name: Tchia
description: A tropical open-world adventure. Climb, glide, swim, and sail your boat around a beautiful archipelago in this physics-driven sandbox. Use Tchia's special ability to take control of any animal or object you can find, and Jam on your fully playable Ukulele. A game inspired by New Caledonia.

name: Deceive Inc.
description: Go undercover as the world’s greatest spies in this tense multiplayer game of subterfuge. Disguise as anyone, deploy an arsenal of high-tech gadgets or neutralize the competition. As long as you extract with the objective, no trick is too dirty when you work for Deceive Inc.

name: Banjo-Kongzooie
description: Sin descripción

name: Airline Boss
description:
Airline Boss is a small BBC BASIC management game, originally written in 1992 and updated with some improvements in 2023.

You have to manage an international airline company. You will start with three airliners and just £50,000. The aim is to be as successful as possible in your new job.

name: Anetha
description: Sin descripción

name: Vexed
description: Sin descripción

name: The Rabbit Crazy Adventure
description: The Rabbit Crazy Adventure is an exciting precision platformer with 50 levels full of challenges and enemies. Take control of a brave rabbit as he embarks on an epic adventure through vibrant and dangerous worlds. Traversing chasms, avoiding deadly traps, and defeating cunning enemies are just a few of the skills you'll need to master to progress.

name: Metroid: Desolation
description: A romhack for Metroid: Zero Mission with multiple endings.

name: Cafe Venus Flytrap
description: You're a fly. A fly whose hobbies consist of writing novels and eating sweets. One day you decide to check out a new cute cafe that promises an abundance of pastries, sweets and drinks. A cafe that is run by adorable froggos.

name: Fatrifice
description: In order to summon a demon, one girl must stuff herself to be the ultimate fatrifice! Help her expand into new shapes and sizes by feeding her!

name: Fortnite: Cross Comms Pack
description: When Tegan is on comms, she never misses a callout. Clear, concise and to the point with the Cross Comms pack. Includes 1 Outfit, 1 Back Bling, 1 Pickaxe and 600 V-Bucks.

name: Hang Gliding: VR Experience
description: Explore a mountain valley on a hang glider, a relaxing flight through this stunning landscape. As in a real hang glider, this experience uses your body movement to control the flight.

name: Roots Need Control 3.0
description:
A coalition of large corporations trying to destroy the root flowers is invading Daejeon. Protect the root flowers. It's not going to be easy.

because... Roots Need Control.

The length of the root changes the number of enemies produced and the speed of the enemy and CrossHair. Make your roots at least short!

Over time, persistent and threatening enemies appear. It's destroyed at once, but once hit, it's fatal. Get rid of your enemies quickly!

Avoid red rain at the top, and avoid missiles by adjusting the length of the roots at the bottom.

Through the 2-player mode, one person protects the roots, and one person defeats the enemies!

name: My Sweet Artificial Lover
description:
You live in a world where androids are a little more than mindless drones that hand out papers in class, clean up at restaurants, and perform menial tasks around the house. However, there’s a company trying their hand at sentient androids, and what a coincidence that two beautiful girls have just transferred into your class.

Integrating with humanity is no easy feat, and you soon find yourself having to explain the most basic things to your new classmates. The more you spend time with them, the more they begin to fall for you… but how do you go about teaching androids about love and intimacy?!

name: Horny Hotel Maids
description: Horny Hotel Maids is a puzzle game, the ultimate goal of which is to swap the blocks to collect the image. But remember, the purpose of this game is to let you relax and enjoy the process. To do this, we added a minimalistic interface and relaxing music.

name: PeopleWillMoney
